attributes.action: A lib dem gen election win would supercede referndum result, permitting Bremain
attributes.background: The decision in the UK referendum has widely lead to negative reprucussions for the UK. Many people regret their decision to 'Brexit'. Many failed to vote 'Remain'. A vote for the lib dems at a forthcoming general election would be a vote to ('Bremain') and hence supercede the referendum result.
